vibesExplanation: The workout is classified mainly under 'The Zen Flow' vibe due to its grounding and intentional approach aimed at quieting the mind and easing anxiety, as clearly highlighted in both the title ('Quiet the Busy Mind') and description ('calm the busy mind and sense of overwhelm').
